data.name: Emergency Contact
data.description: This person must be different to the people in Primary Contact 1 and 2.
data.description_mymember: This person must be different to the people in Primary Contact 1 and 2.

columns.label: Medical details
columns.value: Torin had vasa vagal syndrome when he was pre teen - which means he occasionally feels dizzy/faint after exercise. He knows to stop, sit down and rest/drink water until he feels better.

config.settings_hint: Religion is sensitive personal data and you need a valid lawful processing mechanism for storing this - please consider whether storing associated requirements could negate the need for storing the actual religion.

columns.label: Other useful information
columns.value: He no longer needs to carry an asthma inhaler as asthma v mild

config.settings_hint: Parents will be asked to confirm their details so you can see who last checked the details and when they checked them.

data.name: Additional Information
data.description: This allows you to add extra information for your members.  Any fields added here will be added to all members.

columns.label: SEEE Expeditions Extra notes from parents
columns.orig_label: SEEE Expeditions Extra notes from parents

config.settings_optin_description: Photos & medical details can require additional consent depending on your lawful processing mechanism.  You can store/collect consents through OSM.  Please select ONE photographic consent option that is the closest match to your requirements (as giving parents to choose any of the options would make it impractical to take photos).  All changes to these fields will be stored in the member's history.

config.settings_summary: I give consent for photos/videos of my child to be taken, stored and shared internally in the meeting location, local press, Scout websites and social media. I understand that if I later withdraw consent, previously published photos will not be able to be removed. (Regardless of this consent, the group/unit is not responsible for photos taken by other parties.)
config.mymember_hint: I give consent for photos/videos of my child to be taken, stored and shared internally in the meeting location, local press, Scout websites and social media. I understand that if I later withdraw consent, previously published photos will not be able to be removed. (Regardless of this consent, the group/unit is not responsible for photos taken by other parties.)

config.settings_summary: I give consent for the storage and processing of sensitive personal information, including medical details (these are required for the safety of your child). I understand these may be shared with other Scout groups/organisers if/when my child moves sections or attends external events.
config.mymember_hint: I give consent for the storage and processing of sensitive personal information, including medical details (these are required for the safety of your child). I understand these may be shared with other Scout groups/organisers if/when my child moves sections or attends external events.

config.settings_summary: I agree to the Group sharing my phone number and name with other parents and members of the Group via a closed group via communication platforms, for example WhatsApp.
